body_html: I agree with @cwhipkey. This is potentially expected behavior with bicubic interpolation and a known limitation. This could be verified by running the same minimal test in OpenCV which has a well-tested version of bicubic interpolation and see if you observe the same result.
body_text: I agree with @cwhipkey. This is potentially expected behavior with bicubic interpolation and a known limitation. This could be verified by running the same minimal test in OpenCV which has a well-tested version of bicubic interpolation and see if you observe the same result.
body: I agree with @cwhipkey. This is potentially expected behavior with bicubic interpolation and a known limitation. This could be verified by running the same minimal test in OpenCV which has a well-tested version of bicubic interpolation and see if you observe the same result.
